about_the_game:
This is a demo for Mahou Senshi Cosplay Club


The game is currently under development with an active Kickstarter campaign, running until November 3rd, 2022.

In this demo we wanted you to try a little bit of two of the most important features of the game: Creating Costumes and Turn-based Battles. We put one battle for you to try and some of the content for creating and designing costumes.

If the Kickstarter is successful, the complete game is coming in 2023, and it will be a single-player, story driven, tactical turn-based RPG, about crafting, material combinations, battle skills, and exploring events and quests to find new tools for your crafting. You'll be free to create any looks on your costumes, but you'll need to strategize your choice of materials and skills to overcome battles as they come.

Features not included in the demo

  • Exhibitions and Events exploration
  • Main Story and Quests
  • Random Encounters and side quests
  • Photo mode
  • Contests and Pin Collecting
  • A lot of customization options and gameplay content.
detailed_description:
NOW ON KICKSTARTER


Click here and check the Kickstarter Campaign!


About the Demo

This is a demo for Mahou Senshi Cosplay Club


The game is currently under development with an active Kickstarter campaign, running until November 3rd, 2022.

In this demo we wanted you to try a little bit of two of the most important features of the game: Creating Costumes and Turn-based Battles. We put one battle for you to try and some of the content for creating and designing costumes.

If the Kickstarter is successful, the complete game is coming in 2023, and it will be a single-player, story driven, tactical turn-based RPG, about crafting, material combinations, battle skills, and exploring events and quests to find new tools for your crafting. You'll be free to create any looks on your costumes, but you'll need to strategize your choice of materials and skills to overcome battles as they come.

Features not included in the demo

  • Exhibitions and Events exploration
  • Main Story and Quests
  • Random Encounters and side quests
  • Photo mode
  • Contests and Pin Collecting
  • A lot of customization options and gameplay content.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X or superior
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X or superior
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870 or newer
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

name: Cosplay Club Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870 or newer
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

short_description: In this tactical turn-based RPG you'll embark on the journey of becoming a Magical Girl cosplayer! But don't let this journey fool you, because this is not just roleplaying: your costumes will give you real life powers, and the world's fate will be in your hands!
